ingredients.name: 2 4-5oz lean steaks (sirloin or round) thinly sliced
Tortillas, tomatoes, lettuce, cheese, sour cream, avocado for serving, as desired
¼ teaspoon salt & freshly ground pepper
Dry rub of your choice (see outback recipe)
2 tablespoons chipotle in adobo, pureed in food processor
¾ lb brick of feta in water
¼ cup grated parmesan cheese, optional
1 rack baby back ribs, membrane removed
Dry rub of your choice (see outback recipe)
2 cups long-grain white rice, rinsed and drained
1 tablespoon adobo (1.5tsp salt & 1.5 tsp garlic powder)
1 green bell pepper cut into strips
1 red bell pepper cut into strips
1 teaspoon of each: cumin, oregano, white sugar, salt
3 lbs beef chuck roast, cut into 2inch cubes
¾ cup fresh orange juice (~2 oranges)
¼ cup fresh lime juice (~2 limes)
¼ cup red onion, finely chopped
½ jalapeno, including seeds. Finely chopped
2 kg meat, typically sirloin, cut into 20cm x 1cm x 2cm pieces. Remove excess fat and remember to cut with the train (opposite of how steaks are cut)
⅔ cups creamy peanut butter (or almond or cashew)
¼-½ cup dark or semi sweet chocolate chips (can sub for dried cranberries/rasins)

Optional add-ins: vanilla, pinch of salt, pinch of cinnamon,
                1 tablespoon of chia seeds,
                2 tablespoons of protein powder
¾ cup freshly grated parmesan cheese

ingredients.name: 4-5 lbs pork shoulder, cut into chunks
Lime juice and chopped cilantro for serving
1 cup of beer, amber or lager
Soft pretzels or bread to dip
5 pounds of yukon gold potatoes, quartered
½ cup of half and half or whole milk
½ teaspoon of freshly ground pepper
2 and ¼ teaspoons instant yeast (1 packet)
3 and ½ cups all purpose flour
1 16-oz can of black beans, do not drain
1 and ⅔  cups all purpose flour
1 and ¼ cups semi sweet chocolate chips
2 and ⅔  cups all purpose flour
2 and ¼ teaspoons yeast (1 standard packet)
½ cup unsalted butter, room temp
1 and ¾   cups all purpose flour
1 cup freshly brewed strong hot coffee
1 packet active dry yeast (2 ¼ teaspoons)
⅓ cup baking soda for boiling water
1 cup warm water or warm milk
Optional: 2 tablespoons melted butter + 1 tablespoon honey
1 green or red bell pepper, diced
1 ¼ lbs russet potatoes, peeled and sliced ⅛ in
1 and ⅔ cups all purpose flour

¼ cup vanilla greek yogurt (or sour 
cream)
¼ cup extra virgin olive oil
1 large fresh basil sprig or ¼ teaspoon dried oregano
3 cups and 2 tablespoons all purpose flour
½ teaspoon instant or active dry yeast
1 and a ½ cups warm water
5 oz sun dried tomato strips in oil, drained
1 3/4 cups half and half or heavy cream
2 dried red chiles (or red pepper flakes)

ingredients.name: 12 slices of bacon (cooked), sausage patties or breakfast ham
2 chicken breasts, cut into 1 inch pieces
8 oz semi-sweet or milk chocolate chips
6 medium russet or idaho potatoes, cut into ⅛ inch thick slices
8 ounces cream cheese cut into cubes
Everything bagel seasoning to top with
½ cup fresh basil, roughly chopped
1 1/2 pounds ground chicken, pork, or beef
3/4 pound spicy Italian chicken sausage (see note)
1 cup plain full fat greek yogurt
2 tablespoons salted butter, at room temperature
2 tablespoons bulgogi sauce + more for serving
